name: @kahwee/embryo
description: Cactus is a minimalistic theme for bloggers based on the default theme of the same-named [Cactus static site generator](//github.com/koenbok/Cactus) written in Python and [Nick Balestra](//github.com/nickbalestra/kactus)'s Jekyll port. Noteworthy features of this Hugo theme are the integration of a comment-system powered by Disqus, a customizable about page, support for RSS feeds, syntax highlighting for source code and sharing options for blog posts.
